thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Haima Automobile Sets Aside Provision Of About 523 Mln Yuan For Asset Impairment

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Haima Automobile Sets Aside Provision Of About 523 Mln Yuan For Asset Impairment

organizations.name: reuters) - haima automobile group co ltd

text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Haima Automobile Group Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT SETS ASIDE PROVISION OF ABOUT 523 MILLION YUAN ($82.70 million) FOR ASSET IMPAIRMENT, TO REDUCE 2017 NET PROFIT BY 378 MILLION YUAN Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2Edyagw Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3240 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
